All Things Jill Facial Toner, Rose

Brand: All Things Jill

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: 100% pure Organic Bulgarian Rosa damascena (Rose) water

Brand: All Things Jill

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: 100% pure Organic Bulgarian Rosa damascena (Rose) water

Directions: Mist on the face, neck and body as often as desired. Apply after cleansing or shaving or throughout the day to refresh and renew skin. Useful after treatments including extractions, masks, and massages.
Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
